qas.question: The New Delhi town plan was chosen primarily to symbolize what?
The New Delhi town plan was influenced by what type of architecture?
What town plan was chosen with the chief consideration of displaying British power and superiority?
What is one type of architecture that heavily influenced the New Delhi town plan?

context: <a2_0>The New Delhi town plan<a2_0/>, like its architecture, was chosen with one single chief consideration: to be a symbol of <a0_0>British power and supremacy<a0_0/>. All other decisions were subordinate to this, and it was this framework that dictated the choice and application of symbology and influences from both <a1_0><a3_0>Hindu<a3_0/> and Islamic<a1_0/> architecture.
